attributes.action: Reward the right NHS staff for their service and bravery with a COVID-19 bonus
attributes.additional_details:
Years of under funding are making their jobs dangerous, as well as physically and mentally debilitating.

If not now, when is the right time to put our money where our mouth is?

Talk is cheap! Shake that money tree a bit more.
attributes.background:
1. Reward the right NHS staff for their service and bravery with a special "COVID-19 bonus" that makes a difference to their lives 
2. Increase the salary of the right NHS staff to better compensate them for the value that they deliver to our society

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302613
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300073

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
